select l.*,ap.app_name,ai.interface_name api_name from sys_lov l, sys_application ap, sys_interface ai where l.app_id=ap.id and l.api_id=ai.id
and l.lov_code like concat(concat('%',#{lovCode}),'%')
and l.lov_name like concat(concat('%',#{lovName}),'%')
and l.app_id like concat(concat('%',#{appId}),'%')
order by lov_code
